description: Fly360, founded by biomedical doctor, utilizes drones to enhance agro-ecology in Colombia. Since 2017, the company has provided fumigation and fertilization services for various crops, aiming to technify agriculture and improve efficiency. With a focus on sustainability, Fly360 also offers training for drone pilots and maintenance services. The initiative seeks to reduce chemical usage and promote organic alternatives, addressing both economic and environmental challenges in the agricultural sector.
name: Fly360
